title: ReplicaToken
content: On this page ReplicaToken Token used to identify different types of Replicas.

title: ObserveActivePlayers​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server </> ReplicaModule:ObserveActivePlayers( observer: (player: Player ) → ()-- The function to call when a player is added to the active players list. ) → Connection-- Signal Connection Calls observer for current active players and whenever a player is added to the active players list.

title: OnActivePlayerRemoved​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server </> ReplicaModule:OnActivePlayerRemoved( listener: (player: Player ) → ()-- The function to call when a player is removed from the active players list. ) → Connection-- Signal Connection Calls listener whenever a player is removed from the active players list.

title: RegisterToken​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server </> ReplicaModule:RegisterToken( name: string-- The name of the ReplicaToken. ) → ReplicaToken-- The ReplicaToken. Creates a new ReplicaToken.

title: NewReplica​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server </> ReplicaModule:NewReplica( props: ReplicaProps-- The properties to create the Replica with. ) → Replica-- The Replica.

interface ReplicaProps { Token: ReplicaToken-- The ReplicaToken to create the Replica with. Tags: {[string]: any}?-- The tags to create the Replica with. Default: {} Data: {[string]: any}?-- The data to create the Replica with. Default: {} Filter: FilterName?-- The filter type to create the Replica with. Default: "All" FilterList: {[Player ]: true}?-- The filter list to create the Replica with. Default: {} Parent: Replica?-- The parent to create the Replica with. Default: nil WriteLib: any?-- The write library to create the Replica with. Default: nil }  Creates a new Replica.

title: RequestData​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client </> ReplicaModule:RequestData() → () Requests the initial data from the server.

title: OnNewReplica​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client </> ReplicaModule:OnNewReplica( listener: (replica: Replica) → ()-- Callback function ) → Connection-- Signal Connection Calls listener when a new Replica is created.

title: OnNewReplicaWithToken​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client </> ReplicaModule:OnNewReplicaWithToken( token: string,-- Replica token name listener: (replica: Replica) → ()-- Callback function ) → Connection-- Signal Connection Calls listener when a new Replica with the specified token is created.

title: OnInitialDataReceived​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client </> ReplicaModule:OnInitialDataReceived( listener: () → ()-- Callback function ) → Connection-- Signal Connection Calls listener when the initial data has been received from the server.

title: GetReplicaById​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> ReplicaModule:GetReplicaById( id: string-- Replica id ) → Replica?-- Replica Returns the Replica with the specified id.

title: Path​
content: </> type Path = string | PathTable

title: PathIndex​
content: </> type PathIndex = string | number

title: FilterName​
content: </> type FilterName = "All" | "Include" | "Exclude"

title: FilterList​
content: </> type FilterList = {[Player ]: true}

title: Id​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> Replica.Id: string The Replica's unique identifier.

title: Tags​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica.Tags: {[string]: any} The Replica's tags.

title: Data​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica.Data: {[string]: any} The Replica's data.

title: IsActive​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:IsActive() → boolean-- Whether the Replica is active or not. Returns whether the Replica is active or not.

title: Identify​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:Identify() → string-- A string that identifies the Replica. Returns a string that identifies the Replica.

title: GetToken​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:GetToken() → string-- The name of the ReplicaToken used to create the Replica. Returns the Replica's Token name.

title: GetParent​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:GetParent() → Replica?-- The Replica's parent. If nil, the Replica is a root Replica. Returns the Replica's parent.

title: GetChildren​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:GetChildren() → {[Replica]: true}-- A list of the Replica's children. Returns the Replica's children.

title: SetValue​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:SetValue( path: Path,-- The path to set the value at. value: any,-- The value to set. inclusion: Inclusion?-- Overrides the Replica's filtering settings for this call. ) → () Sets a value at a path.

title: SetValues​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:SetValues( path: Path,-- The path to set the values at. values: {[PathIndex]: any},-- The values to set. inclusion: Inclusion?-- Overrides the Replica's filtering settings for this call. ) → () Sets multiple values at a path.

title: ArrayInsert​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:ArrayInsert( path: Path,-- The path to insert the value at. value: any,-- The value to insert. index: number?,-- The index to insert the value at. If nil, the value will be inserted at the end of the array. inclusion: Inclusion?-- Overrides the Replica's filtering settings for this call. ) → () Inserts a value into an array at a path.

title: ArraySet​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:ArraySet( path: Path,-- The path to set the value at. index: number,-- The index to set the value at. value: any,-- The value to set. inclusion: Inclusion?-- Overrides the Replica's filtering settings for this call. ) → () Sets a value in an array at a path.

title: ArrayRemove​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:ArrayRemove( path: Path,-- The path to remove the value from. index: number,-- The index to remove the value from. inclusion: Inclusion?-- Overrides the Replica's filtering settings for this call. ) → () Removes a value from an array at a path.

title: OnChange​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:OnChange( path: Path?,-- The path to listen for changes at. listener: ( new: any, old: any ) → ()-- The function to call when the value at the path changes. ) → Connection-- Signal Connection Listens for value changes at a path.

title: OnValuesChanged​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:OnValuesChanged( path: Path?,-- The path to listen for SetValues changes at. listener: ( new: {[PathIndex]: any}, old: {[PathIndex]: any} ) → ()-- The function to call when the values at the path change. ) → Connection-- Signal Connection Listens for SetValues changes at a path.

title: OnNewKey​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:OnNewKey( path: Path?,-- The path to listen for new keys at. If nil, the listener will be called when a new key is added to the root Data table. listener: ( key: any, value: any ) → ()-- The function to call when a new key is added to the path. ) → Connection-- Signal Connection Listens for new keys at a path.

title: OnArrayInsert​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:OnArrayInsert( path: Path?,-- The path to listen for array inserts at. listener: ( index: number, value: any ) → ()-- The function to call when a value is inserted into the array at the path. ) → Connection-- Signal Connection Listens for array inserts at a path.

title: OnArraySet​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:OnArraySet( path: Path?,-- The path to listen for array sets at. listener: ( index: number, value: any ) → ()-- The function to call when a value is set in the array at the path. ) → Connection-- Signal Connection Listens for array sets at a path.

title: OnArrayRemove​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:OnArrayRemove( path: Path?,-- The path to listen for array removes at. listener: ( index: number, value: any ) → ()-- The function to call when a value is removed from the array at the path. ) → Connection-- Signal Connection Listens for array removes at a path.

title: OnKeyChanged​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:OnKeyChanged( path: Path?,-- The path to listen for key changes at. listener: ( key: any, new: any, old: any ) → ()-- The function to call when a key changes at the path. ) → Connection-- Signal Connection Listens for key changes at a path.

title: OnRawChange​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:OnRawChange( path: Path?,-- The path to listen for raw changes at. listener: ( actionName: string, pathTable: PathTable, ...any ) → ()-- The function to call when a raw change occurs at the path. ) → Connection-- Signal Connection
type PathTable = {string | number}  Listens for raw changes at a path.

title: OnChildAdded​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:OnChildAdded( listener: (child: Replica) → ()-- The function to call when a child Replica is added. ) → Connection-- Signal Connection Listens for child Replicas being added.

title: ObserveState​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:ObserveState( path: Path,-- The path to observe. valueObject: Value<any>-- The Fusion Value object to set the value of. ) → Connection-- Signal Connection Observes the value at the specified path and sets it as the value of the Fusion Value object.

title: OnChildRemoved​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:OnChildRemoved( listener: (child: Replica) → ()-- The function to call when this Replica is destroyed. ) → Connection-- Signal Connection Listens for child Replicas being removed.

title: SetParent​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:SetParent( parent: Replica-- The Replica to set as the parent. ) → () Sets the parent of the Replica. Only works on root Replicas (replicas with no initial parent.)

title: SetReplication​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:SetReplication( settings: FilterSettings-- The settings to set the Replica's replication to. ) → ()

interface FilterSettings { filter: FilterName?-- The name of the Filter to set. If nil, the filter will not be changed. players: {[Player ]: true}?-- List of players added to the filter list. If nil, the filter list will not be changed. }  Sets the replication settings of the Replica.

title: AddToFilter​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:AddToFilter( player: Player -- The player to add to the filter list. ) → () Adds a player to the Replica's filter list.

title: RemoveFromFilter​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:RemoveFromFilter( player: Player -- The player to remove from the filter list. ) → () Removes a player from the Replica's filter list.

title: Destroy​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:Destroy() → () Destroys the Replica.

title: GetFilterList​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:GetFilterList() → {[Player ]: true}-- A list of players that the Replica is filtered to. Returns the Replica's filter list.

title: GetFilter​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Replica:GetFilter() → Filter-- Type of filter the Replica is using Returns the Replica's filter.
